principle_step_model_gpu: Data Cost + Model Cost + Overhead Cost + Environment Cost
description_step_model_gpu: data cost: [input size]-[channel size]-[batch size], about input data
model cost: [conv layer num]-[total layer num], about the model architecture
cpu cost: [input size ncpu]-[batch size ncpu]-[total conv layer ncpu]-[total layer num], about overall model concurrently running on cpu
environment cost: [gpu TFLOPS]-[platform], about the GPU
principle_step_model_cpu: Data Cost + Model Cost + Overhead Cost on CPU
description_step_model_cpu: data cost: [input size]-[channel size]-[batch size], about input data
model cost: [conv layer num]-[total layer num], about the model architecture
cpu cost: [input size ncpu]-[batch size ncpu]-[total conv layer ncpu]-[total layer num], about overall model concurrently running on cpu
environment cost: [threads num]-[train batch on disk or memory]-[platform]
